## **[Students Marks Sum](https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/students-marks-sum)** 
You are given an array of integers, , denoting the marks scored by students in a class.<br><ul><li>The alternating elements , , and so on denote the marks of boys.</li><li>Similarly, , , and so on denote the marks of girls.</li></ul><br>The array name, , works as a pointer which stores the base address of that array. In other words, contains the address where is stored in the memory.<br>For example, let and stores 0x7fff9575c05f. Then, 0x7fff9575c05f is the memory address of .<br><br>Complete the function, <code>marks_summation(int* marks, char gender, int number_of_students)</code> which returns the total sum
